message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1000000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $950000. This offer is designed to provide you with a significant advantage while ensuring a substantial return for us. I trust that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know your thoughts on this proposal.
